Monterey_Park.Rio Hondo College: Rio Hondo College is a community college located near the cities of Whittier, Pico Rivera, and Industry, California, named after the Rio Hondo. Founded in 1960, it mainly serves the cities of Whittier, Pico Rivera, Santa Fe Springs, El Monte, and South El Monte. Rio Hondo College offers 23 associate degrees for transfer that guarantee transfer to California State Universities, 50 associate degrees and 60 certificates.
